CNV File & Storage Formats

VCF

  • VCF specification v4.2 PDF

BED files and other columnar segment files

  • BED file documentation at UCSC genome browser

Schema-defined files and databases

Schema-defined variant annotations can be serialised and stored or transmitted using e.g. the JSON format.

For information about some of the used schemas please see the CNV Annotation Formats page.

@mbaudis 2019-12-12
